availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram Bond (Covington, Kenton county, Kentucky, master stone cutter)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, master stone cutter. Ohio native. Married to Hannah Bond. Father of Henry Bond, Matilda Bond, William Bond, John Bond, and Hiram Bond. Stone cutter in Covington in 1850. Master stone cutter in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 4, p. 273A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 6, p. 836.
